Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Western
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses temp. rerouted WB: Madison, Western, Washington, California, Madison; EB: Madison, California, Warren, Western, Madison near Madison/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Madison/Western, due to police activity.

Westbound buses will operate via: Madison, Western, Washington, California, and Madison.

Eastbound buses will operate via: Madison, California, Warren Western, and Madison.

Allow extra travel time.
